name: random-seed-missing
description: Random operations without seed for reproducibility

files.content:
import random
import numpy as np

def generate_test_data():
    # Random operations without seed
    data = [random.randint(1, 100) for _ in range(1000)]
    
    # Numpy random without seed
    matrix = np.random.rand(10, 10)
    
    return data, matrix

def shuffle_list(items):
    # Shuffle without seed
    random.shuffle(items)
    return items

violations.message: Random operations without seed for reproducibility
